评论详情: This shirt is so cute! It fits perfectly, the material is somewhat soft and it keeps you pretty warm, but you could definitely wear it in the summer. The quality of the material is amazing the material isn't super thick but it is very nice. Overall great shirt would buy again and it is definitely worth more than what it costs!
I normally don't purchase anything white because it usually ends up being see-through, however this year is thick and very stretchy. Will definitely purchase again!
Size and material are ok, but the fit of the shoulder straps to the chest is off and doesn't fit well. Always seem to fall off the shoulder.
it has so much potential bc it is so cute and decently priced but the sleeves do not stay up at all. one move away from flashing someone maybe try sizing down
The sleeves fall down constantly

I like the idea of the shirt. Backless, split hem, sweet heart neckline I love that. It also is not see though the sizing is my fault. The sleeves were tight on my arms, I did like how it fit but I think it might’ve been Better if I got a medium. It’s definitely a shirt you could go bra less in especially if the sleeves held up. It’s soft. However I don’t love that the top of the shirt slides off in the first picture & mine came with a white smudge kinda like a deodorant smudge when you put on a shirt after deodorant. I did also like the price for.
This top is so cute and I love the little cut sides BUT I hate how the sleeves kept falling. I had to use double sided tape so I didn’t spend the entire night pulling my sleeves up.
did not look like the picture, shoulders fall off and are very big. Also tried returning it and never received a refund.
I gave it 2 stars because while it’s so cute the sleeves are really irritating i may need to get it adjusted or something…
It fits nicely just sleeves falling from time to time but I love the design and material.
I’m and true medium and it never stayed on my shoulders. Very cute but not good quality.

I ordered the smallest size because I’m petite. The neck is way too big and doesn’t stay up. Would be really cute if it stayed up. Would probably fit someone better with bigger cup size. Good quality and was comfortable.
I love the way this top fits! My only complaint is the sleeves fall down a lot and would not stay on ly shoulders.

评论概述: Does not fit like the photos
评论详情: I am really bummed about this long-sleeved crop top that I ordered in black for my daughter.  The photos on Amazon show a really cute, nice fitting top.  That is not what I received.  The top fit my daughter except for the shoulders, they were falling off her.  Not just a little bit, but down to her elbows.  I even tried washing it to see if it would fix it, nope!Even though the shirt did not fit right, the material is soft, and it did hold up well in the washing machine and dryer.

My tween daughter really loves the cropped top look these days, and the way we compromise is I allow her to wear tops with a cropped hemline. This top fits her perfectly and she loves it. She is a size 12 in kids clothing for reference, and this woman's XS is a perfect fit. The top is stretchy and seems well-made. My only issue with the wide-neck design is that it's hard to keep your bra straps from showing. I'd recommend a strapless bra with this one.
It fits really well other than staying in my shoulders if I sit down the sleeves come off my shoulders exposing me
Super cute but fits weird in shoulder area. Super tight on arms and really loose on shoulders. Kept pulling it up all night
I'm not sure if it is just me, but this top does not stay on my shoulders very well. Other than that, it is super cute and flattering though!
Cute shirt but the shoulders fall off. The material was great and I loved the colors but there was no way to keep the shoulders on.
Just looked awful, the fit, the material. It all looked cheap. Sent it back.

I ordered this for my daughter, the shirt is very nice, the material is soft, it is very stretchy, almost too stretchy. It is also made bigger than normal shirts, my daughter normally wears a small / medium, I ordered a small and it is still one to two sizes too big. The shirt is nice, just make sure you order a size or two smaller.
i loved this shirt so much and its super flattering but the shoulders kept falling down the entire time i wore it. i had to buy clothing tape and stick it to my shoulders

I was not expecting to like this too as much as I did! I had to order a royal blue top for a friends bday, so this was a very last minute purchase. I saw on the other reviews that the sleeves fall off easily & to size down to help that issue. I sized down to an x-small, and it was perfect! Throughout the night, the sleeves fell a little bit  BUT it was still super cute because it looked like an off the shoulder top!! The quality is super stretchy and soft. I was worried about sweating it in too bc of the color, and I didn’t!! Definitely recommend!
It’s so soft and comfortable. I love the long sleeve with the square around the neck. It look elegant and sexy to me. It’s fit perfectly. Price is very cheap. Great product and highly recommend it

评论概述: not at all what i expected
评论详情: i ordered small and it was way to big

Its stylish design and slim fit make it versatile for different settings.  5. **Size:** The size mentioned is "Medium," indicating that it is available in multiple sizes to accommodate different body types. Overall, the "ForeFair Women Y2K Long Sleeve Blackless Crop Top" seems to offer a trendy and fashionable option for women looking to add a stylish piece to their wardrobe. I like this shirt because of the material and how it feels on the skin BUT … the sleeves do not stay on your shoulders AT ALL. Have to return because they do not stay up ://

评论概述: Very cute, but large shoulder area
评论详情: This top is very flattering, for reference I have a 36G cup and they were sitting in this... I will say though a bra is probably necessary because the shoulders are so long and always fall off. That aspect is quite annoying but you could always rock it off the shoulder if you see fit
Fits true to size, looks great on!
This was a gift for college daughter who loves it.  Comfortable material, and seems good quality for the price.  Washed well.

This long-sleeved black backless shirt is snug/form-fitting and super cute!  The material has a light stretch to it so you can still move.  If you want a looser fit, go up a size.  This shirt goes well with a pair of denim jeans or a dress skirt so it is very versatile!  Overall a great addition to my wardrobe!

This top is a really awkward cut. It is on the small side, but the shoulders are wide. They keep falling off of my wife's shoulders, which is really annoying. She thought the slits would be cute, but they land right below her bra line, which makes for a weird silhouette. It might work for someone wanting a club shirt, but it's not really that flattering.
I like it but the neckline is a little too big

I got this for my girlfriend and she gave it back.  The size is a bit large (small) and typically she fits anything sized small normally.  The cut is a bottom side cuts are a bit weird, and that is topped off by the shoulders not staying on your shoulders.  Move a bit, and down they drop.I'm not sure what body type these were designed for, but it just doesn't work for her.  I'm not sure who it would work for actually.
this product is very soft fits nice in the sizes on point. I love the color and it’s not itchy at all.

I wanted to try out something new and make my style more trendy so I thought this top would be a nice casual piece. First off it looks exactly like the picture. The arm sleeves bell out subtly and there are slits on the side of the waist. I will say that the arm sleeves are pretty long and almost cover my hands but I think it’s intended to be that way. Just be carful when eating haha. The color is a gorgeous muted medium shade of blue and the fabric is soft and stretchy. My only complaint is that the fabric shows all my lumps and bumps and has no smoothing aspect to it. It’s still very pretty and easy to style though.

The shirt was supposed to be burgundy but was more like a bright red, and the neckline was so huge that it wouldn’t stay on my shoulders. The rest of the shirt fit fine like a typical Medium, but the neckline was like an XL.

okay so it is SO cute, but i can’t even wear it because the sleeves fall down no matter what. i did look at the reviews before and saw people had the same problem and thought well maybe going for an XS will fix that. nope, the top of the shoulder is so loose and it just falls. i’m gonna order a new one from shein, because those are way cheaper, and better quality than this one! the back is so cute though i wish the sleeves were better 😭😩

This shirt is adorable and very soft, good quality material. I did have to return for a small size. I would say it runs large. It fit everywhere but the shoulder were to big and fell off the shoulders.

If this shirt fit just like the photo, it would be amazing. That was not the case. The shirt doesn’t even stay up on the shoulders. Usually a stretchy material is great but not in this case. It’s too loose for me. I ordered a medium but it doesn’t seem like a small would fit either.
I didn’t like how you had the best posture in the world. I also didn’t like how see-through it was.

The ForeFair Women Y2K Long Sleeve Blackless Crop Top is cute in theory but, because the back is so open the sleeves have little support to stay up on your shoulders. The material is thick and soft and the style would be cute if it stayed up. Overall, it's a fine material but is a bit cheap and doesn't work for how open the back of the shirt is. I would not recommend.

评论概述: Good quality - doesn't fit me right
评论详情: The quality of this top is really nice and it does look exactly like the photo. However, it does not sit on my shoulders. Note, I am typically a size S but with that, I do have larger shoulders. With this product, it falls off my shoulders so I was thrown off.. for that I am giving it a 3 star.
This should be advertised as an off the shoulder shirt, can’t even attempt to pull them over my shoulders. Also a lot shorter in length than pictured

评论概述: Shoulder and arms fit are off
评论详情: Love the style and look of this shirt. The color was just as shown in picture. The material is the right thickness and fairly opaque (see picture).  The main negative about this shirt is its fit - the body fit really well, but the shoulder fit was just not right. The arms keep falling off. Not sure if sizing down would help as the fit for the rest of the body would be too tight then. We will have to stitch up the arms to make them fit.
The fit is super off with this top - got my usual size and the top fits but the sleeves fall off
Love this top! It’s so cute and soft. The only thing I wish is that the sides were sew because they are too open. The sizing and quality is great!

I love the style and fit of this shirt! It’s incredibly flattering for me. Photos show me wearing it without a bra. I just need nipple petals and I’ll be set. It does fall off the shoulders easily though.

If you like a snug fit, this is great. Extra long sleeves come just over the hand, and open back is soooo stylish!  Wore it with jeans and boots and a denim jacket! Looked great and plenty of compliments!

This top is very cute. I’m not sure if you can tell in the description and pics here, but it is pretty good for compression. I’m usually a small but I ended up switching it out for a medium because it was a bit smaller than I expected. I recommend definitely sizing up unless you are good with it being slightly tight and short. Otherwise, I’m a big fan of this top and got it in other colors after trying it on and loving it.  The y2k look has made a come back recently and I had been wanting to hop onboard but have been wary of the designs I’ve seen. Thankfully, this one is as nice as it looks online.

This is such a cute little top. I got it to go with a pair of black goth pants. It fits true to zize. I ordered a small and it fits perfectly.  The material is light weight and breathable. The baby pink is so beautiful. It is well made and looks food on. It is easy to take care of. Just throw it in the washer and dryer with all your other clothes it is thst easy. Plus the price is good. I love it.

Looove this top!! So cute, the fit is true to size, material is soft stretchy and comfortable. It’s decently thick, I did wear a sticky bra under and I don’t think it was see through at all! Without anything nipples were definitely visible. The side slits are just so dang cute I can’t say enough about it. Great purchase!!

Was cute but didn’t fit very nicely. It’s nice and stretchy and a good material which was comfortable, but kept falling off arms, would recommend if you have a wider torso and size down as much as possible. Hope this helps!

It is a.  nice top but I wouldn’t recommend it for DD bra sizes. It fit in the chest but what happens when you get it to fit the chest is it falls of your arms because the top is wider. Unless you have a wide chest and back area I  wouldn’t buy.
I love this top a lot, but it is huge on my shoulders. The rest of the shirt fits perfectly fine, but when I rest my shoulders down the sleeves fall off. Great shirt, wish it would fit.
It is good material and very soft, the only problem is that the top falls off the shoulders majorly.
